moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Add User to the Domain and/or to a Domain Group
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module adds a user to the Domain and/or to a Domain group. It will
        check if sufficient privileges are present for certain actions and run
        getprivs for system.  If you elevated privs to system, the
        SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege will not be assigned. You need to migrate to
        a process that is running as system. If you don't have privs, this script
        exits.
author: Joshua Abraham <jabra@rapid7.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: The username of the user to add (not-qualified, e.g. BOB)

options.name: GROUP
options.description: Add user into group, creating it if necessary

options.name: ADDTOGROUP
options.description: Add group if it does not exist

options.name: ADDTODOMAIN
options.description: Add to Domain if true, otherwise add locally

options.name: TOKEN
options.description: Username or PID of the token which will be used (if blank, Domain Admin tokens will be enumerated)
